articles.title: Meeting Marked Anniversary of Assumption of Supreme Commander
articles.content:
Meeting Marked Anniversary of Assumption of Supreme Commander
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the April 25 House of Culture on Wednesday to mark the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army. 
					 Present there were senior party, army and state officials, the chairpersons of the friendly parties, officials of the party, armed forces, power organs, public organizations, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the KPA, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media and working people in Pyongyang. 
					
					 KPA General Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, said in a report delivered at the meeting that Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the KPA on December 24, Juche 80 (1991) marked a historic event of weighty significance in strengthening and developing the revolutionary armed forces in the DPRK and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 The reporter went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the KPA helped more steadfastly carry forward the glorious history and tradition of the Korean revolution in which it was started and has triumphed with arms of independence and enabled the army and the people of the DPRK to steadily advance the socialist cause of Juche, meeting the challenges of the imperialist reactionaries with the might of Songun.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has energetically led the struggle to implement the  party's military line of self-defence and develop the national defence industry, bolstering up the KPA as a-match-for-a hundred revolutionary army with matchless combat capability, placing all the people under arms and turning the whole country into an invulnerable fortress. 
					
					 The reporter referred to the fact that the KPA has emerged the strongest army in idea and faith as it regards the spirit of devotedly defending the leader as its life and soul and grown to be invincible revolutionary armed forces having tremendous offensive and defensive means, winning one victory after another in the fierce confrontation with imperialism and the DPRK has demonstrated to the whole world the dignity and honor, prestige and might as a country which manufactured and launched satellites and a full-fledged nuclear weapons state. 
					
					 The reporter called for building a thriving socialist nation as early as possible with the might of Songun and bringing earlier the day of national reunification and the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Acute confrontation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the moves of the U.S. and its followers to ignite a new war, he noted, and warned: If the U.S. and its followers intrude into the sky, land and sea of the DPRK even an inch and dare disturb the legitimate exercise of its sovereignty, its revolutionary armed forces will mercilessly destroy the stronghold of aggression with unpredictable retaliatory blows, no matter who they may be and wherever they are on earth, and surely achieve the independent reunification of the country, the cherished desire of the nation.

articles.title: Performance of KPA Ensemble
articles.content:
Performance of KPA Ensemble
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- A song and dance performance of the Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble was given at the April 25 House of Culture on Wednesday on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the KPA supreme commandership and the 92nd birth anniversary of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 Appreciating it were senior party, army and state officials, chairpersons of the friendly parties, officials of party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons, persons of merit and working people in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Put on the stage of the performance, which began with mixed choruses "General Kim Jong Il, Peerless Patriot" and "Where Are You, Dear General", an everlasting masterpiece, were colorful numbers such as dance "Happiness of Being under the Care of the Respected General" and male chorus "Let's Keep Step with the General".
					
					 The performers highly praised the undying feats performed by Kim Jong Il who has steadily carried forward President Kim Il Sung's cause of the Juche-based army building and brought about epochal changes in defence of socialism and the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation by strengthening the KPA into the driving force of the Songun revolution and ushered in the heyday of prosperity by effecting a new great revolutionary surge.

articles.title: Performances of Working People's Organizations
articles.content:
Performances of Working People's Organizations
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Working people's organizations gave art performances on the occasions of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 92nd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine.
					 Among the audience were Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the working people's organizations, people from all walks of life and youth and students.
					
					 The Workers' Art Squad of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, the Art Squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and the Art Squad of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea began their performances with songs "Glory to General Kim Jong Il", "General of Korea" and "Kim Jong Suk Is Our Mother".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the leadership feats of Kim Jong Il who has led the Juche-oriented army-building to victory and glory with his far-sighted wisdom and outstanding commanding art.
					
					 Put on the stages were numbers highly lauding the greatness of Kim Jong Suk who still inspires the people of the whole country to a sacred struggle, always finding herself under the red flag of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Significant Day of DPRK Celebrated
articles.content:
Significant Day of DPRK Celebrated
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Workers and  members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea and the Democratic Women's Union of Korea separately held meetings at the Central Hall of Workers and the Women's Hall on Tuesday to celebrate the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Present there were Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, officials and members of the federation and the union and workers. 
					
					 The reporters and speakers said that Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the KPA made it possible to vigorously advance the Juche-based Songun cause and successfully carry forward the tradition of the Korean revolution started with arms. 
					
					 They referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il has built the Korean People's Army into the strongest elite armed forces prepared politically and ideologically and in military technique and energetically led them to creditably fulfill their mission and role as a main force for the Songun revolution.   
					
					 The years during which Kim Jong Il has led the revolutionary armed forces represent a glorious history in which he has brought about epoch-making miracles and changes in the struggle for defending socialism and building a thriving nation, weathering grave difficulties under the uplifted banner of Songun, they stressed.
					
					 Our cause is sure to triumph as long as there are the distinguished Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, the unbreakable single-minded unity and the strong revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu firmly defending Korean-style socialism, they noted, calling for staunchly struggling for the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: Landscape and Handicraft Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
Landscape and Handicraft Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition of landscape paintings and handicraft was opened on Wednesday to commemorate the 92nd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine.
					 Presented to the exhibition were at least 300 pieces of landscape and handicraft of various genres produced by artists of fine art studios including the Mansudae Art Studio and the Korean Central Fine Arts Studio.
					
					On display at the exhibition hall were works showing the great life and exploits of Kim Jong Suk. Among them are poster "May Our Great Country Prosper Forever!" which depicted the personality of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu, the great persons, and Korean painting "Comrade
						 Kim Jong Suk, Anti-Japanese Heroine".
					
					 There are also works on the majestic looks of Songun Korea seething with the drive to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The exhibits include ceramics and embroideries showing the wisdom and talent of the Korean nation.
					
					 Its opening ceremony took place at the Pyongyang International Cultural Centre.

articles.title: Landscape and Handicraft Exhibition Visited by Foreigners
articles.content:
Landscape and Handicraft Exhibition Visited by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of foreign embassies here Wednesday visited the national exhibition of landscape paintings and handicrafts commemorating the 92nd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine.
					 They looked round the art works praising her brilliant revolutionary life and exploits and reflecting the reality in the DPRK where the noble desire of the woman commander of Mt. Paektu has been fully realized under the wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits Phyongchon Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits Phyongchon Revolutionary Site
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here Wednesday visited the Phyongchon Revolutionary Site on the occasion of the 92nd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine.
					 The guests laid bouquets before the mosaic depicting the benevolent images of the peerlessly great persons and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They looked round  historic materials, being briefed on the fact that the three commanders of Mt. Paektu paid deep attention to the establishment and development of the Juche-oriented national defence industry and visited a munitions factory there several times, clearly indicating the orientation and ways.
					
					 At the end of the visit they made entries in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Wreath to Bust of Kim Jong Suk from Chinese
articles.content:
Wreath to Bust of Kim Jong Suk from Chinese
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China, sent a wreath to the bust of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on the occasion of her 92nd birth anniversary.
					 It was laid there on Wednesday.

articles.title: Tribute to Kim Jong Suk Paid by Foreigners
articles.content:
Tribute to Kim Jong Suk Paid by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of foreign embassies here laid a wreath before the bust of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Wednesday on the occasion of her 92nd birth anniversary.
					 After placing the wreath carrying their deep reverence, they paid silent tribute to Kim Jong Suk, woman commander of Mt. Paektu who established the brilliant tradition of devotedly defending the leader in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and devoted her all to the liberation of the country and happiness of the people.

articles.title: Vietnamese Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Vietnamese Ambassador Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Le Van Cu, Vietnamese ambassador to the DPRK, and Nguyen Van Lich, military attache of the Vietnamese embassy here, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Dec. 22 on the occasion of the army day of Vietnam.
					 Present there on invitation were Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, general officers and other officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of various countries and military attaches of different embassies here.
					
					 On hand were members of the Vietnamese embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Ancient Mural Tomb, Astronomical Observatory Discovered
articles.content:
Ancient Mural Tomb, Astronomical Observatory Discovered
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- An archaeological team of Kim Il Sung University has discovered a mural tomb and a ruined chomsongdae (old astronomical observatory) belonging to the period of Koguryo in the construction site of Pyongyang Folk Park in the area of Mt. Taesong.
					 The former is on a hill west of the ruins of the Anhak Royal Palace at the foot of Mt. Taesong and the latter is about 250 meters west of the western gate of the palace.
					
					The earthen tomb consists of a passage and a square stone chamber.
					
					 The chamber is 3.1 meters long from south to north and 3.05 meters long from east to west, and its remaining wall is 1.6 meters high. The passage leading to the chamber is 3.05 meters long and 1.35 meters wide.
					
					 The mural painting has faded away except for green lotus patterns, black water-drop patterns, etc.
					
					 Dug out there were an axe-blade-shaped iron arrowhead, an iron nail and fragments of a broken dark grey pot.
					
					 The chomsongdae has a quadrangular main facility surrounded by a heptangular subsidiary facility.
					
					 Its total acreage is about 380 square meters. Each line of the heptangular stone facility is 9.1-9.2 meters long and the heptagon is about 20.6 meters in diameter.
					
					 As for the quadrangular facility, the south-north length is 7.5 meters and east-west length is 6.7 meters at the upper part, while 7.2 meters and 6.7 meters at the lower part respectively.
					
					 The walls of the main facility have layers of charcoal, gravel and lime. The charcoal part is 10.24 square meters.
					
					 So far chomsongdaes built in different periods have been found in the Korean peninsula, but it is the first time that Koguryo's chomsongdae was discovered.
					
					 The above-said relics are of significance in confirming the historic position of Pyongyang as a cradle of the nation and hub of national culture and in intensifying research into the history of Koguryo.

articles.title: Spirit of Defending Leader Devotedly Is Life of Korea
articles.content:
Spirit of Defending Leader Devotedly Is Life of Korea
Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The Korean revolution was pioneered and has been carried forward along with the spirit of devotedly defending the leader.
					 From the beginning of the revolution it had been the supreme task of the Korean nation to devotedly defend President Kim Il Sung, the lodestar and future of the nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine who set out on the revolution in her early years, dedicated her all without hesitation to the President's personal safety and health, deeply aware of an important mission history entrusted to the times and nation.
					
					 During the anti-Japanese armed struggle, she protected him from danger, risking her life, in hundreds of fierce battles including the Hongqihe and Dashahe Gully battles.
					
					 The lofty example she set in defending the leader at the cost of her life is still remembered by the Korean people.
					
					 She also prepared meals for the President without fail even in a series of fierce battles and hard march and made overcoat, waistband and socks with silk cotton and woolen yarn for him.
					
					 Her life as a lifeguard and soldier continued in the liberated country.
					
					 When the president started on a long inspection tour, she inquired of meteorological observatories the weather, grasped road conditions, told his bodyguards about matters needing special attention and made preparations to ensure his personal safety in any situation.
					
					 Following her example, the slogan "Let us defend with our very lives the leadership of revolution headed by the great Comrade Kim Jong Il!" has become a symbol of the faith of the Korean People's Army and many units have been honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment, which distinguished itself in defending the leader during the anti-Japanese armed struggle, in the Songun era.
					
					 In the most rigorous days of the revolution, she secured the Korean people blessed with having a great leader and made the army infinitely faithful to the leader, the supreme commander. These exploits of the heroine will be conveyed down through generations along with the eternal prosperity of Songun Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" was brought out in pamphlet by the Khabarovskaya Krayevaya Tifografia Publishing House of Russia on Dec. 18.
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 86 (1997), clarifies the idea that preserving the Juche character and national character of the revolution and construction is the fundamental principle that should be maintained in accomplishing the socialist cause and the tasks and ways to do so.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Colombian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Colombian Organization
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The Group for the Study of the Juche Idea "Kanggye" of Colombia issued the bulletin titled "Peerlessly Brilliant Commander" on Dec. 14 to mark the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 The bulletin in an article said that the past 18 years since the Korean people have had Kim Jong Il as the supreme commander of the KPA were the days during which it has been verified that he is a peerlessly brilliant commander.
					
					 He is endowed with extraordinary wisdom and ingenious strategy as well as unshakable faith, indomitable will and matchless courage and grit, it noted.
					
					 The KPA will always emerge victorious as it has Kim Jong Il possessed of deepest love for the soldiers as its supreme commander, it stressed.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Suk
Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- On the evening of December 23, Juche 35 (1946) President Kim Il Sung told a woman who was lodging in his house that the next day was the birthday of
					 Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine.
					 Hearing what he said, Kim Jong Suk, with a bright smile on her face, said how could she have a birthday party since the President had refused to have his birthday celebrated.
					
					 Actually, the woman had gone shopping from several days ago to prepare a birthday dinner for the heroine without her knowing.
					
					 Acquainting herself with the fact, however, Kim Jong Suk stopped her from the preparation, saying that as the President was working hard, they should not concentrate on trifling things but on showing great devotion to him.
					
					So, Kim Jong Suk, who should have taken best wishes from all the people, spent her birthday with just receiving congratulatory remarks from the President before taking a simple breakfast as usual. It was the second birthday she had in the country after its liberation.

articles.title: Tiene lugar en Pyongyang acto central por el 24 de diciembre
articles.content:
Tiene lugar en Pyongyang acto central por el 24 de diciembre
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 23 en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 18o aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea (EPC).
					En el acto participaron los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los presidentes de los partidos amigos, los funcionarios de los organos del partido, las fuerzas armadas, el Poder y de las organizaciones sociales y de masas, los ministerios e instituciones centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC, los funcionarios de los dominios de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, asi como los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					 El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del general de ejercito del EPC Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC.
					
					 El Dirigente Kim Jong Il fue nombrado hace ahora 18 anos, o sea, el 24 de diciembre del 80 (1991) de la Era Juche como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, comenzo el orador y prosiguio:
					
					Eso fue un evento historico que tiene suma importancia para el desarrollo de nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					 Gracias a este evento, se dio la firme continuidad a la orgullosa historia y las tradiciones de la revolucion coreana, iniciada y triunfada con las fuerzas armadas independientes, y nuestro ejercito y pueblo pudieron llevar adelante la causa socialista del Juche frustrando con el poderio del Songun los desafios de los reaccionarios imperialistas.
					
					Gracias a que el Dirigente condujo de manera entusiasta las labores para materializar la linea militar de autodefensa del PTC y desarrollar la industria de defensa nacional, el EPC ha crecido y fortalecido como poderoso ejercito revolucionario con invencible capacidad combativa que puede pelear a solas contra cien rivales. Ademas, todo el pueblo se ha armado y todo el pais se ha convertido en un baluarte inexpugnable.
					
					 Hoy dia, el EPC, que se ha robustecido como ejercito poderoso en la idea y fe que toma como su primera vida el espiritu de defensa a costa de la vida al lider y como invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias dispuestas de todos los medios poderosos de ataque y defensa, logra victoria tras victoria en la enconada confrontacion con los imperialistas.
					
					 Asimismo, la RPDC exalta a todo el mundo su dignidad, honor, autoridad y gallardia como pais productor y lanzador de satelite artificial y digno poseedor de armas nucleares.
					
					 Debemos construir cuanto antes una gran potencia prospera socialista con el poderio del Songun y anticipar la reunificacion de la patria y la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Ahora en la Peninsula Coreana se da la coyuntura de agudo enfrentamiento debido a las maniobras de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satelites para provocar la nueva guerra.
					
					Si ellos invaden una pulgada del cielo, la tierra y el mar de nuestra patria o tratan de obstaculizar el justo ejercicio de la soberania de nuestro pais, nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias destruiran despiadadamente mediante un imprevisible golpe de represalia los focos de esos agresores, sean cuales fueran estos y dondequiera que esten en este planeta, y lograran asi sin falta la reunificacion independiente de la patria, que anhela tanto nuestra nacion.

articles.title: Funcion del Conjunto Artistico del EPC
articles.content:
Funcion del Conjunto Artistico del EPC
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 18o aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del aniversario 92 del natalicio de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa              Kim Jong Kuk tuvo lugar el dia 23 en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril la funcion de musica y danza del Conjunto Artistico del EPC.
					Vieronla los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los presidentes de los partidos amigos, los funcionarios de los organos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las organizaciones de masas, los ministerios y los organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del EPC, benemeritos y trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					En la escena iniciada con el coro mixto "El General Kim Jong Il, patriota sin igual" y la obra maestra "?Donde esta el querido General?" se pusieron la danza "Esta felicidad en el regazo del estimado General", el coro masculino "Marchemos al unisono con el paso del General" y otras piezas.
					
					Los ejecutantes elogiaron altamente las inmortales hazanas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien glorifica con brillantez la causa autoctona de construccion del ejercito del Presidente Kim Il Sung, logro el gran exito en el combate de defensa al socialismo y la construccion de la gran potencia prospera fortaleciendo el ejercito popular como grueso de la revolucion del Songun y abrio la era dorada de la prosperidad con nuevo y gran auge revolucionario.

articles.title: Actos de obreros, gremiales y mujeres
articles.content:
Actos de obreros, gremiales y mujeres
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 22 en la Casa Central de Obreros y en la Casa de Mujeres los actos conmemorativos de obreros, miembros de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea (FGSC) y de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea (UMDC) en ocasion del 18o aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente        Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					En las ocasiones participaron el secretario del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jung Rin, y otros cuadros, funcionarios de la FGSC y la UMDC, obreros y miembros de estas dos entidades sociales.
					
					 Los oradores dijeron que gracias a poner al Dirigente en el supremo cargo de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias fue posible llevar adelante dinamicamente la causa del Songun-Juche y suceder con exito las tradiciones de la revolucion coreana iniciada por las fuerzas armadas.
					
					 Se refirieron a que el Dirigente formo al ejercito popular como fuerzas armadas  selectas mas fuertes preparadas tanto en lo politico e ideologico como en lo militar y tecnico y lo dirigio con dinamismo para que cumpliera su mision y papel como el grueso de la revolucion del Songun.
					
					 Subrayaron que los dias de la direccion del Dirigente sobre las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias devienen la orgullosa historia de que el ha venido creando los prodigios y cambios seculares en la lucha por la defensa del socialismo y en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera superando severas dificultades bajo la bandera del Songun.
					
					 Enfatizaron que mientras haya la destacada direccion del Songun del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la inquebrantable unidad monolitica y el poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu que defiende con firmeza el socialismo al estilo coreano, es  definitivo el triunfo del pueblo coreano.
					
					 Senalaron la necesidad de luchar con vigor por llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche.

articles.title: Entidades de masas ofrecen funciones artisticas
articles.content:
Entidades de masas ofrecen funciones artisticas 
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 18o aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del 92o aniversario del natalicio de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa              Kim Jong Suk, las entidades de masas ofrecieron funciones artisticas. 
					 Las presenciaron el secretario del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea Kim Jung Rin, funcionarios de las entidades de masas, trabajadores de distintos estratos, jovenes y estudiantes. 
					
					 Las funciones preparadas por el Grupo de Propaganda Artistica de Obreros del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea, el Grupo de Propaganda Artistica del CC de la Union de la Juventud Socialista y el Grupo de Propaganda Artistica del CC de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea se iniciaron con las canciones "Gloria al General", "General de Corea" y         "Kim Jong Suk, nuestra Madre".
					
					 Los ejecutantes alabaron altamente las proezas de direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien con la inteligencia clarividente y el destacado arte de mando militar conduce al unico camino de la victoria y gloria la causa de construccion del ejercito del Juche. 
					
					 En las escenas se pusieron las piezas que elogian con entusiasmo la noble personalidad de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk estando junto con la bandera roja del Paektu y estimulando a todo el pueblo a la sagrada lucha.

articles.title: Inaugurada exposicion nacional en homenaje a Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Inaugurada exposicion nacional en homenaje a Kim Jong Suk
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 23 en la Casa Internacional de Cultura de Pyongyang la exposicion nacional de paisajes, bordados y productos de artes menores por el 92o aniversario del nacimiento de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk.
					 En esta ocasion fueron presentadas mas de 300 piezas de diversos generos creadas por los pintores de los organos de creacion de bellas artes, entre otros, la Casa de Creacion Mansudae y la Casa Central de Creacion de Bellas Artes.
					
					 En la sede del evento estan exhibidas las obras, que muestran la grandiosa vida y las proezas de   la Heroina, incluyendo la pancarta "!Que prospere eternamente mi gran pais, mi patria!", que describe las nobles personalidades de los tres generales del monte Paektu (el Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y la Heroina), y la pintura al estilo coreano "Camarada Kim Jong Suk, Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa".
					
					 Tambien, se ven las obras que muestran el majestuoso aspecto de la Corea del Songun  enfrascada en la lucha por abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera bajo la direccion del partido.
					
					 Tambien, estan exhibidos los productos ceramicos y bordados que reflejan la inteligencia y los talentos de la nacion coreana.
